meanings.definition: Not attempting to impress others with an appearance of greater importance, talent, or culture than is actually possessed.
meanings.sent1: She preferred an unpretentious style, avoiding flashy clothes and accessories.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant had an unpretentious atmosphere, making customers feel comfortable and relaxed.
meanings.sent3: His unpretentious demeanor made him stand out in a crowd of boastful individuals.
meanings.sent4: The unpretentious beauty of the sunset painted the sky in soft hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The unpretentious charm of the small town captured the hearts of all who visited.

meanings.sent1: She wore an unpretentious dress to the party, blending in with the simple decor.
meanings.sent2: The unpretentious design of the house reflected the owner's humble personality.
meanings.sent3: Despite her wealth, she chose to live in an unpretentious manner, without any extravagant displays.
meanings.sent4: The unpretentious garden bloomed quietly, without the need for elaborate decorations.
meanings.sent5: His unpretentious speech resonated with the audience, conveying sincerity and humility.

meanings.sent1: Her unpretentious smile lit up the room, genuine and warm.
meanings.sent2: The artist's unpretentious approach to painting focused on raw emotion rather than artificial techniques.
meanings.sent3: In a world full of fake smiles, her unpretentious laughter was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent4: The unpretentious honesty of his words cut through the facade of lies and deceit.
meanings.sent5: The unpretentious nature of the cafe welcomed all, regardless of social status or background.
